action: I want to complete the approval process for submitted applications entirely within the system
reason: Because I need to eliminate paper and verbal approvals to visualize operations and ensure internal control
acceptance_criteria: The system shall allow only authenticated users to submit applications.
The system must support configurable application data types (e.g., expenses, leave, contracts).
The system shall require a title, content, and reason for every application submission.
The system must execute the saving of application data within a single database transaction.
The system shall automatically generate a globally unique Application ID for each record.
The system must automatically determine the approval workflow route based on user roles or organizational hierarchy.
The system shall prohibit modification of application content while the status is 'Pending'.
The system must allow application editing only when the status is transitioned to 'Returned'.
The system shall enforce strict status transitions restricted to defined states: Pending, Approved, Rejected, and Returned.
The system must restrict approval, rejection, and return operations to users with specific approval authority.
The system shall log every approval workflow operation including Application ID, User ID, Action, and Timestamp.
The system must require a mandatory comment input when an application is Rejected or Returned.
The system shall implement optimistic locking to detect and prevent concurrent approval conflicts.
The system must publish notification events to an asynchronous queue upon approval results.
The system shall maintain a full history of approval actions and application content modifications.
The system must support logical deletion only for approved applications to preserve audit trails.
The system shall enforce row-level security to prevent unauthorized users from viewing applications other than their own.
The system must allow Administrators to view and search all application records.
The system shall support the configuration of approval deadlines and send reminder notifications upon expiration.
The system must use parameterized queries and input sanitization to prevent SQL injection and XSS.
The system shall enforce HTTPS for all data transmission and must not expose internal database details in API responses.
The system must store audit logs in tamper-evident storage to prevent modification.
The system shall target an API response time of under 500ms for approval operations.
